title: Moving millions
creator_credit: Crown Film Unit, Central Office of Information, John Taylor and Noel Arthur
brief_description: Shows how the London transport system handles the millions of yearly passengers. Much of the film deals with behind-the-scenes activities such as the washing and overhaul of vehicles, the training of drivers and conductors, and the testing of new safety devices. Music by Lambert Williamson.
